name: Industrial Dredge
content:
Industrial Dredge

A massive industrial complex built around a vast dredging operation. Primary Objectives are control nodes. Secondary markers are power conduits or maintenance access points. The ground is constantly being reshaped by the dredging machines.


Terrain Features:

  • Control nodes
  • Power conduits
  • Maintenance access points
  • Dredging equipment

Atmosphere:

The air is filled with the sound of massive dredging machines and the constant movement of earth. The ground trembles with the operation of heavy machinery, and the sky is darkened by the dust of constant excavation.
